snippet: An exhibition of modern and contemporary Indian art in New Jersey.
abstract: An exhibition of modern and contemporary Indian art in New Jersey.
lead_paragraph: “Before ‘Goddess, Lion, Peasant, Priest,’ an exhibition of modern and contemporary Indian art, came to the College of New Jersey last month, it had already provided its curator with a crash course on Americans’ attitudes toward art from that part of the world,” Tammy La Gorce wrote in The New York Times.
